com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.item.armour

Class ArmourMaterial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.JsRegisteredClass
      • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.MinecraftClassWrapper
        • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.item.armour.ArmourMaterial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWrapper

    public class ArmourMaterial
extends MinecraftClassWrapper
    This class wraps around a Minecraft ArmorMaterial, allowing for custom armour materials to be added to armour
    Author:
    pcr3w

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArmourMaterial

        public ArmourMaterial(java.lang.String name,
                      int durability,
                      int[] reductionAmounts,
                      int enchantability)
        Creates a new armour material with the given properties
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the material
        durability - How much damage the armour can take before breaking
        reductionAmounts - An array of 4 numbers, each representing how many half shields of protection an armour piece provides
        enchantability - How enchantable the armour is - higher values will give better enchantments when enchanted

      • ArmourMaterial

        public ArmourMaterial(net.minecraft.item.ItemArmor.ArmorMaterial mat)

      • setRepairItem

        public ArmourMaterial setRepairItem(Item item)
        Sets the item that can be used to repair the armour
        Parameters:
        item - The repair item
        Returns:
        The armour material to allow for chaining
